experience.title: Backend Developer (Specialist Programmer)
responsibilities: Working on Apple Online Store Checkout Applications using Java/Scala, Spring Boot, JUnit, ScalaTest, Spring Data JPA, PostgreSQL on AWS RDS.
Implemented Apache Kafka for asynchronous event-driven events like sending analytics and invoice emails.
Developed Consolidation Delivery Feature across multiple microservices, resulting in significant shipping cost savings.
Monitored Splunk logs and resolved 100+ bugs across production and non-production environments.
Played a pivotal role during Apple's NPI event, monitoring user interactions with the online store checkout to identify bottlenecks and implement optimizations.

experience.title: Software Engineer
responsibilities: Led frontend development using Flutter with MVC architecture, GetX state management, Dio for backend integration, Firebase Authentication, Firecloud, and Strapi with PostgreSQL.
Developed a complete application from scratch including social media feed, chats, notifications, group feeds, and Instagram-like stories.
Optimized app performance to achieve 100% crash-free users and reduced storage requirements to 50 MB for an app with 150,000+ downloads.

experience.title: Backend Developer Intern
responsibilities: Developed a License Validation System from scratch using Vercel Cloud functions, MySQL database, and Gumroad Payment API.
Wrote clean code in Node.js with Express.js for handling API calls and mysql2 npm package for database connectivity.

projects.title: Nasheedio - Spotify Alternative
achievements: Led and managed the tech team operations across Backend, Website, and Mobile App development.
Achieved 100,000+ downloads on Play Store with a 99% crash-free rate.
Created the Flutter App from scratch with features including Authentication, YouTube Content Player, Original Content Player, conference calling, and AI assistant.
Utilized GetX, Firebase, StrapiJS, PostgreSQL, and Dio for development.

projects.title: Blockchain Based Pension Management System
achievements: Created an Ethereum dApp using Flutter and Solidity to address bureaucratic corruption in the pension system.
Won TECHEXPO Hackathon with this innovative project.

education.institution: Pranveer Singh Institute of Technology (AKTU), Kanpur

achievements.description: Ranked top 500 of 200k+ participants in HackwithInfy and later got hired as Power Programmer by Infosys.
GATE-Computer Science Qualified with All-India Rank 8644.
Winners (Second Place), TECHEXPO Hackathon, PSIT Kanpur.
Published Research Paper - Analyzing the Performance of a DAPP Using Blockchain 3.0, IEEE.
